name: How to Use a Returner
author: 도미
content: [Will you join the game?]Giyoung&#039s suddenly thrown into a game of life and death. Not only that, but he&#039s also the player with the lowest stats. Still, he&#039s got one skill on his side: the ability to read other players&#039 status!He finds the opportunity of his life when he discovers that Hyunsung is a returner to this world.Now all Giyoung has to do is stick next to Hyunsung and game his way out of this tutorial.
